page.title: 10POLITICS:WENHAM AND RAYDON
page.content: The three main political parties all have associations in the area whose constituency is now called South Suffolk following boundary changes in 1982. The Conservative Association has a strong social function enabling members to meet their M.P.Mr Tim Yeo who was elected at the last election and now lives in East Bergholt.Other social functions such as supper parties and cheese and wine evenings enable members to keep in touch and also to raise fundsds which are needed during both local and national elections.Then members help by delivering leaflets and transporting elderly and disabled people to polling stations. The local Labour Party have monthly meetings when they discuss local, national and international events.A quarterly newsletter is distributed.
